title: United States Senate Candidate Favors a Woman’s Right to Cook Him Dinner?
subtitle: Decrying a "non-stop feminization campaign against manhood," a GOP Senate candidate said he supports a woman’s right to "become traditional homemakers."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Republican candidate for U.S. Senate for Missouri, Courtland Sykes, said he "supports women’s rights" but not if that means women become "career obsessed banshees who forego home life and children and the happiness of family to become nail-biting manophobic hell-bent feminist she devils."
